profile_positions.description:
DTC campaign planning, execution and international delivery for a renowned online retailer 

• Working as an account executive with the agency team to devise social media campaigns and assets that meet the client's brief and budget 
• Responsible for relevant internal and external meetings (including 3rd party partners, suppliers, and clients) and handling new briefs, creative briefs, debriefs, reviews, creative pit stops, presentations, key status sessions, and liaising with key client staff
• Ensuring that all staff in all departments are updated on all aspects of the project/job
• Being the point of contact for client and assisting with daily requests
 • Support the account director in managing Zalando's always-on content delivery, campaign delivery and being responsible/supporting for channels:  Facebook (global, ES, IT, FR markets), Instagram - main, beauty, street channels, TikTok
• Working with the external productions houses and vendors (influencer companies, etc) and ensuring that all resources are in liaison and on time for a specific job/ project
• Assisting in preparing and delivering of the campaign's roll out plans
• Responsible for daily tracking of projects in Asana project management software tool
• Responsible for content scheduling and posting on the following channels:  Facebook (Creator Studio), Instagram(global, beauty, street), Tik Tok
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
B2C & DTC campaign execution and global delivery for a FMCG brand

•	Working with the global account director in collaboration with cross-functional marketing functions – development and execution of paid communication plans (brand, marketing communications, consumer insights, customer marketing, social, PR, ecomm, etc)
•	Assisting with internal and external meetings (including designers, UX, CRO as well as 3rd party partners, suppliers, and clients) and handling new briefs, creative briefs, debriefs, reviews, creative pit stops, presentations, key status sessions, and liaising with key client staff
•	Managing Mars client Royal Canin – B2B and DTC presence globally
•	Coordination of the agency team as well as collaboration with external production houses and vendors (TVC, sound and VO studios, etc) to ensure that all resources are in liaison and on time for a specific project
•	Assisting with  budgets, execution timelines, campaign management costs, usage rights, and client/vendor invoicing (PO issuing) 
•	Assisting with  updating and tracking of project statuses in WorkBook agency software (costs, traffic, timelines, invoices)
•	Responsible for updating assets to client´s global CRM system and for the global market support for open file materials 
•	Successfully delivered projects: global campaign with 700+ assets in 2,5 months – main fim and social video assets, static and animated banners, additional program names and lockup designs, new imagery retouching and distribution, KV design and retouching, static and animated carousels, deployment kit, visual charter, etc.
profile_positions.title: Global Account Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
B2B and B2C marketing, sales, and project management for media clients in The Nordic region
(Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, Iceland) and globally (Asia, Pacific, Middle East)

• Marketing campaign sales and management for digital and tech companies in English and Swedish;
• Handling initial pitches to prospects, campaign ideas, budget negotiations, contracts and execution
timelines, and client invoicing
• Working with the agency team to devise an advertising/ brand positioning/ PR
campaign that meets the client's brief and budget – TVC, OOH, radio, digital, print
• Handling negotiations with prospects and clients from FMCG, finance, tourism boards, retail, etc.
• Responsible for market research and campaign consultancy for the execution (strategy,
HLs, visuals, channels, video storyboards, communication with external production
partners, etc)
• Advising on digital campaign execution: KPI defining, setup and tracking, in
depth analysis and optimization (Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, etc)
• Responsible for client success management and CRM management (Hubspot, Pipedrive,
Workbook, etc)
• Successfully closed deals and delivered projects: branding and performance marketing campaigns, as well as media buying for global brands in the Nordic territory
profile_positions.title: Business and Marketing Development Manager Nordics

profile_positions.description:
B2C campaign management and consulting activities on diverse marketing platforms in The Adria region

•	Working as an account executive with the agency team to devise an advertising /brand positioning/ PR campaign that meets the client's brief and budget – TVC, OOH, radio, digital, print
•	Responsible for all relevant internal and external meetings (including 3rd party partners, suppliers, and clients) and handling new briefs, creative briefs, debriefs, reviews, creative pit stops, presentations, key status sessions, and liaising with key client staff
•	Ensuring that all staff in all departments are updated on all aspects of the project/job
Managing clients such as Heineken EMEA, Coca Cola Company EMEA, Fortenova Group (FMCG goods), and others
•	Working closely with the external productions houses and vendors (TVC, sound and VO studios, etc) and ensuring that all resources are in liaison and on time for a specific job/ project
•	Handling market research (benchmarks), budgets, execution timelines, campaign management costs, usage rights, and client/vendor invoicing (PO issuing) 
•	Supported the material preparations for international marketing competitions
•	Responsible for updating and tracking of projects in WorkBook agency project management software tool
•	Successfully delivered projects: 360 campaigns, packaging design, TVC advertising, brand naming, brand positioning, and localization, website development, media buying, and more
profile_positions.title: Marketing Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
B2C and B2B campaign management and PR consulting activities on diverse marketing platforms in The Adria region

•	Working with the agency team to devise a full PR support that meets the client's brief and budget – TVC, OOH, radio, digital, print
•	Strategy development, market research, brand positioning, media buying, influencer marketing, brand localization for international clients
•	Handling international clients such as Reebok EMEA, Möbel Land, BMW, Pianoforte Group (Calzedonia, Yamamay), Fashion&Friends (Tommy Hilfiger, Calvin Klein, Liu Jo, Guess), De Rigo Group (Furla, Carolina Herrera, Police), and others
•	Handling budgets, execution timelines, campaign management costs, and client invoicing 
•       Handling performance based marketing - content and platform planning, KPI planning, media buying, collaborations with external agencies and partners, setup, tracking and optimization
•      Daily management of marketing practices on Facebook Ads, Instagram Business, LinkedIn Ads Ads, Google Ads, Google Analytics, MailChimp, and others.
•	Management of the social media channels (post scheduling, content and infographics design, community management)
•	Event and press day organization for international and local clients
•	Responsible for monitoring the effectiveness of campaigns, press clipping, and earned media value reporting to clients
•	Successfully delivered projects: PR localization campaigns for international brands, media buying, influencer marketing, collection promotion, brand positioning, store opening
profile_positions.title: Junior Marketing Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Working as part of the marketing team to develop and execute marketing strategies to position the website as the best student media website in the region (over 60.000 followers on social media)
• Responsible for the concept development and devising ideas on potential stakeholders and partners, as well as collaborations
• Collaborated with the sales sector for client management and ad offers (media buying)
• Reaching out to companies with project ideas, attended and supported regular meetings with partners and potential advertising clients (e.g. IKEA)
• Responsible for creative content - writing PR features depending on the topic/client brief
• Supported development and evaluation of monthly social media analysis and reports
• Daily usage of Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, and WordPress for optimization or analysis

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for writing  University corporate-related materials
•	Daily updating and developing the University website (Croatian and English) and intranet
•	Daily press clipping and media monitoring (print and online media, foreign university-related media)
•	Responsible for maintaining of the press clipping database

profile_positions.title: Marketing And Public Relations Intern

profile_positions.description:
•	Working as part of the marketing team to localize the AIESEC brand and raise its awareness in Croatia and the region
•	Responsible for adaptation, implementation, and coordination of the global AIESEC brand strategy
•	Responsible for the entire social media strategy and management (content creation, designing, post scheduling, optimization)
•	Working on the webpage optimization (WordPress, SEO)
•	Responsible for results monitoring while using Google Analytics and Facebook Ads Manager
•	Writing PR features for the AIESEC website and other online and print media
•	Handled the communication between the organization and local companies for funding
•	Handled international relations in terms of communication with foreign students interested in or involved with AIESEC projects abroad, coaching the exchange participants during their internships, coordination with other AIESEC teams and colleagues to expand exchange opportunities
profile_positions.title: Marketing and PR Associate
